info_about_repot: You can manually enter your time by going to
choose_practice_description: Choose the practice method that suits you best

timer.title: Standard Practice
timer.description: Practice chosen skills freely and track your progress

plan.title: Exercise Plan
plan.description: Choose a ready-made plan and follow it

auto.title: Auto Plan
auto.description: Let us create a plan adjusted to your time

time_splitter.title: Session Summary
time_splitter.question: How did you spend your time?
time_splitter.learned_description: Mark as 'Learned' and move to completed

spotify.login_description: To listen to full tracks (not just 30s previews), make sure you are logged into <1>Spotify.com</1> with an active Premium account.

reset_dialog.title: Reset timer?
reset_dialog.description: This will clear all tracked time for every skill in this session. This action cannot be undone.
